title: Muir Woods National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit      Muir Woods is open 365 days a year, and no reservations are required to visit.        Muir Woods is extremely popular and parking is extremely limited. Carpool, arrive early (between 8 a.m. and 9:30 a.m.) or late (one to two hours prior to closing) and read our other suggestions for making your visit to this peaceful forest a peaceful visit.                   How to Avoid the Crowds               Operating Hours and Seasons               No Cell Phone Reception at Muir Woods   Operating Hours and Seasons We are open everyday! Fees and Passes How much does it cost? Pets Pets are not allowed in Muir Woods.   Directions and Transportation How do I get there? Calendar Park Ranger programs and special events.  Accessibility Where to go, things to do and best activities when accessibility is on your mind. Basic Information Address, directions, hours, weather, and fees.
